packages.name: Zooz Switches Advanced Drivers
packages.description:
Zooz Switch & Dimmer drivers with advanced features and settings:
ZEN21, ZEN22, ZEN23, ZEN24, ZEN26, ZEN27, ZEN71, ZEN72, ZEN73, ZEN74, ZEN76, ZEN77, ZEN30
packages.descriptive:
Features:

  • Supports all security modes including S2
  • All configuration variables available with designated defaults per Zooz
  • All Association Groups are available - check Zooz docs for specifics
  • Scene Functions matching Zooz docs (10 unique actions) - MUST Enable Scene Control parameter on some models
  • Brightness Correction - allows you to set min/max brightness but it will display as 1-100% on your dashboard! See this Post: Check HERE for Details
  • Full Supervision Support - for outbound set/remove commands Check HERE for Details
  • Set Level duration up to 127 minutes for 7x models for smooth transitions Check HERE for Details

For more info on the advanced settings and button mapping check the Zooz Support Documentation.
Select your switch model > Z-Wave Questions > Advanced Settings (bottom right corner)

packages.name: Zooz Sensors Advanced Drivers
packages.description:
Zooz Sensor drivers with advanced features and settings:
ZSE11, ZSE18, ZSE40, ZSE41, ZSE42, ZSE43, ZSE44
packages.descriptive:
Features:

  • All configuration variables available with designated defaults per Zooz
  • Pressing configure will queue up a full reconfigure next wake up.
  • Pressing Refresh will queue up a full refresh next wake up.
  • Normally at Wake Up it will just request the battery level to avoid excessive commands.
  • If you change settings and save it will queue them up to be set at the next wake up. So you can force it to wake up right away or just leave it and let it do it on its own.

For more info on the advanced settings check the Zooz Support Documentation.
Select your model > Z-Wave Questions > Advanced Settings (bottom right corner)

packages.name: Zooz Relays Advanced Drivers
packages.description:
Zooz Relay drivers with advanced features and settings:
ZEN17, ZEN51, ZEN52
packages.descriptive:
Supported Models:

  • ZEN17 Companion ONLY - Min Firmware 1.04
  • ZEN51 Relay - Min Firmware 1.40
  • ZEN52 Double Relay - Min Firmware 1.40

NOTE: See Instructions on Community Post!

Features:

  • All configuration variables available with designated defaults per Zooz
  • ZEN17 Sync from Device to grab existing settings as a starting point
  • Scene Functions matching Zooz docs (10 unique actions)

For more info on the advanced settings check the Zooz Support Documentation.
Select your model > Z-Wave Questions > Advanced Settings (bottom right corner)

packages.name: Zooz Plugs Advanced Drivers
packages.description:
Also works on many other Z-Wave power metering plugs!
Zooz Plug drivers with advanced features and settings:
ZEN04, ZEN05, ZEN14, ZEN15, ZEN20, ZEN25
packages.descriptive:
Officially Supported Models:

  • ZEN04 Smart Plug - [Product Info] [Settings Docs]
  • ZEN05 Outdoor Plug - [Product Info] [Settings Docs]
  • ZEN14 Outdoor Double Plug - [Product Info] [Settings Docs]
  • ZEN15 Power Switch (v1.06) - [Product Info] [Settings Docs]
  • ZEN20 Power Switch (2.0+) - [Product Info] [Settings Docs]
  • ZEN25 Power Switch (2.0+) - [Product Info] [Settings Docs]

Features:

  • All configuration variables available with designated defaults per Zooz
  • Basic energy monitoring from collected metrics (on available models)
  • Can be used as a universal Z-Wave plug driver including Power Metering!

For more info on the advanced settings check the Zooz Support Documentation.
Select your model > Z-Wave Questions > Advanced Settings (bottom right corner)
